column1: Funeral sevice will be held at 1:00 p.m. Monday
column3: 2015 in High's Chapel with David Daugherty
column4: and Ken and Casey Shirley officiating. Burial will follow in Shellsford Cemetery. Visitation will be from 1:00 p.m. until 8:00 p.m. Sunday and from 9:00 a.m. until the time of service Monday at High's.
